name: 99 Pictures
description:
"99 Pictures" tells a coming-of-age story about the young girl Nele who loses something dear to her. Scrapbook with Nele and place stickers to change the course of her tale, and help her learn how to overcome grief and get the closure that she deserves.  

Currently still in development, only a short demo/ prototype is available! We want to continue developing and eventually create 3 unique routes with 2 endings each!

This game is being developed by 3 artists and game devs from Germany:

YooksTea | Umbramira | Hirngespinst 

P.s. leave a comment if you're German and you get the German references ;)
